Sentencas: Co-Cu alloys have been co-deposited onto 430 ferritic stainless steels via electroplating with a citrate solution.
Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: inner layer was formed on the coated steel.
Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With extended oxidation, the (Co,Cr)(3)O-4 inner layer has been transformed into a Cr-rich oxide inner layer.
Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An obvious outward diffusion of Fe appeared, leading to the formation of an (Cu,Cr,Mn)-doped (Co,Fe)(3)O-4 interaction zone between the Co3O4-based spinel and the chromia oxides.
Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Co-Cu coating effectively blocked the outward migration of Cr from the substrate.
Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: No Cr element could be found in the coupled La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) plate of the coated sample after oxidized at 800 degrees C in air for 500 h. The highly conductive coating with a structure of CuO/Co-based spinels significantly decreased the growth of the Cr-rich oxide scale, and thus a much lower scale area specific resistance (ASR).
Titulo: Evaluation of electroplated Co-Cu metallic coatings for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical properties and the oxidation mechanism of the coated substrates were discussed.
